content: p l y m o u t h y a r n® b200 free pattern with our compliments find inspiration www plymouthyarn com elina from nako textured baby blanket approx finished size 21 x 21 5 24 x 28 28 x 32 materials elina from nako 2 3 4 100g balls shown in color 2846 gauge approx 20 sts =4 over pattern needles 24 circular size 5 & 6 with smaller needles cast on 110 122 142 sts knit 6 row for beginning border change to larger needles begin pattern multiple of 4 sts + 2 row 1 rs k4 * k2 p2 repeat from * across to last 6 sts end k2 k4 row 2 ws k4 * p2 k2 repeat from * to last 6 sts end p2 k4 row 3 knit row 4 k4 purl to last 4 sts end k4 work row 1-4 for pattern work in pattern until total length is approx 20 5 27 31 ending with a row 2 change back to smaller needles ending border knit 6 row bind off loosely on next row knitwise weave in all ends ©2024 plymouth yarn company 110724jbt abbreviations k = knit p = purl st s = stitch es rs = right side ws = wrong side
